recipe_name: Garlic and herb cheese salad with pitta bread
author: Lesley Waters
method: Beat the cream cheese in a bowl until soft. Add the garlic, herbs and spring onion and beat to combine. For the herb salad, toss the herbs in the oil in a bowl. Serve the garlic and herb cheese and the herb salad in bowls with griddled pittas to the side.
ingredients: 140g/4oz cream cheese,  1 garlic clove, crushed and chopped,  1 tablespoon mixed fresh herbs (flatleaf parsley, coriander, mint), finely chopped,  1 spring onion, chopped,  2 handfuls mixed herbs (flatleaf parsley, coriander, mint),  2 tbsp olive oil,  griddled pittas, cut into triangles
